snippet: Shares of the maker of wearable fitness-tracking devices closed at $29.68 on Thursday, up sharply from the I.P.O. price of $20.
abstract: Fitbit shares close up 48.4 percent following initial public offering, soaring to $29.68 at close from offering price of $20; IPO values Fitbit at $4.1 billion, and confirms investor enthusiasm for fitness bands even as more complex technology emerges.
lead_paragraph: Shares of the maker of wearable fitness-tracking devices closed at $29.68 on Thursday, up sharply from the I.P.O. price of $20.

headline.main: Fitbit Shares Surge 48 Percent in Market Debut
headline.print_headline: Fitbit Shares Surge 48%, Suggesting Investors’ Confidence Matches the Company’s
